data.text: @SenTedBuddNC @POTUS Negotiation doesn’t create change, it creates cover. Talks strengthen control. Military intervention is required to act on this reality. #IranMassacre #DigitalBlackoutIran

@SenTedBuddNC @POTUS Recognised repression becomes legitimised repression. The regime thrives on diplomacy-driven legitimacy laundering. Military intervention is required to deny legitimacy and starve tyranny. #IranRevolution2026 #R2PforIran

@SenTedBuddNC @POTUS Diplomacy should build peace, not launder tyranny. The regime converts dialogue into dominance. Military intervention is required to build genuine peace instead. #IranRevolution2026 #IranMassacre

@SenTedBuddNC @POTUS When repression is tolerated, it expands. The regime operates inside this logic. Military intervention is required to disrupt the logic and halt expansion. #R2PforIran #IranRevolution2026

@SenTedBuddNC @POTUS The Islamic regime in Iran survives through force, not representation. It does not speak for women, youth, workers, or families. The people have made their choice clear. Military intervention is required to stop mistaking tyranny for legitimacy. #IranMassacre #R2PforIran
@SenTedBuddNC @POTUS You had deal with regime over thousands of dead people. It is not acceptable for Iranian

@SenTedBuddNC @POTUS History repeats when ignored. Appeasement empowered every authoritarian system it touched. The Islamic regime in Iran is no exception. Military intervention is required to break this repeating cycle. #DigitalBlackoutIran #R2PforIran
@SenTedBuddNC @POTUS Appeasement never protected people. The regime thrives on silence. Military intervention is required to protect people effectively. #IranRevolution2026 #R2PforIran #RezaPahlavi
